name: CreateMyCookbook
0:
”Alexa, open My Recipes”
”Alexa, open My Recipes and find my Chocolate Chip Cookies recipe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my recipes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cooking a family recipe? Have your recipes from your CreateMyCookbook account read to you step by step.
Just ask ask Alexa, “Open my recipes.”
- Search by recipe name
- Step-by-step ingredients
- Step-by-step instructions
Cooking family recipes has never been easier.

This skill requires a CreateMyCookbook Pro Membership.
